author: sacha.
title: Un lote de medicamento contra el colesterol retirado debido a la presencia de un comprimido antidiab\u00e9tico
text:
No confunda agentes hipoglucemiantes e hipolipidemiantes. El primer término se refiere a un medicamento antidiabético, cuyo objetivo es reducir los niveles de azúcar en sangre, mientras que el segundo se refiere a un medicamento contra el colesterol.
Y sin embargo, esto es lo que ha ocurrido recientemente, desde que se encontró una pastilla contra la diabetes en una caja de medicamentos contra el colesterol. Tanto es así que la Agencia Nacional de Seguridad de Medicamentos tuvo que emitir una advertencia y una retirada del producto.
Lanzamiento de un llamamiento a los pacientes preocupados
“Hemos sido informados por el laboratorio Arrow del descubrimiento de un comprimido de liberación modificada de Gliclazida 30 mg (hipoglucemiante) en un frasco de comprimidos del lote JBM2300810F de comprimido recubierto con película genérico Arrow atorvastatina 10 mg (hipolipidémico)”, detalla la ANSM (Fuente 1). “El laboratorio Arrow, de acuerdo con la ANSM, retira del mercado los frascos del comprimido recubierto con película genérico Arrow atorvastatina 10 mg del lote JBM2300810F. Los pacientes que tengan en casa un frasco de este lote están invitados a Llévelo a la farmacia para que lo reemplacen.”, continúa la agencia gubernamental.
El riesgo para los pacientes que toman gliclazida en lugar de atorvastatina es la hipoglucemia, indica la Ansm, que pretende ser tranquilizadora, precisando que hasta el momento (21 de noviembre) no se ha comunicado al laboratorio ningún caso de farmacovigilancia relacionado con el defecto de calidad.
Tenga en cuenta que este error sólo afectay…
Leer más
Health

author: Belmin Kopic
title: LEGO Horizon Adventures faces record-low Steam launch for Sony
text:
LEGO Horizon Adventures, the latest PlayStation-published game on Steam, has had a disappointing launch, reaching only 602 concurrent players on its first day.
[LEGO Horizon Adventures](https://www.altchar.com/games/lego), the latest and newest release from[ Sony](https://www.altchar.com/publishers/sony) for the [PC](https://www.altchar.com/platforms/pc), has gotten off to a less-than-stellar start. It has just set an unfortunate record of the worst launch performance of any PlayStation-published game on [Steam, ](https://www.altchar.com/publishers/steam)peaking at only 602 concurrent players on its first day.
That figure clears the boards and puts the title below even Sackboy: A Big Adventure, which took the previous low at 610 peak concurrent players upon its delayed release to PC in 2022. LEGO Horizon Adventures is a brand-new title, though, making these figures all the more worrying.
It also does terribly among the other LEGO games on Steam, placing fourth-lowest in peak players out of the 24 listed. LEGO Horizon Adventures is also available on [PS5](https://www.altchar.com/platforms/playstation/playstation-5) and [Nintendo Switch](https://www.altchar.com/platforms/nintendo/switch), but its Steam launch is particularly disappointing given that the Horizon franchise typically performs well on PC.
Previous PlayStation-to-PC titles, like [Horizon Zero Dawn Remastered](https://www.altchar.com/games/horizon-zero-dawn) and [Until Dawn](https://www.altchar.com/game-news/can-you-run-until-dawn-on-your-rig-check-out-the-official-pc-system-specs-to-find-out-aDj2X4k5gUAx), have also struggled to capture strong launch numbers on the platform, suggesting a worrying trend for Sony’s PC publishing strategy.
Loyal players of the Horizon series and LEGO titles might still be there to pick up the game on other platforms, but poor launch on PC isn't exactly setting it up for a strong comeback.
The weekend is about to kick in, which may allow for a slight increase in player numbers. However, starting that low makes it anyone's guess whether the interest in the game can improve or gain attention worth noting.
Until we find out more, LEGO Horizon Adventures is off to a difficult uphill climb for success on PC. Whether the game would have done better under other circumstances is anybody's guess and should leave Sony to reconsider the way it designs future launches.

author: Cameron Ormond
title: Is birth control affecting your race day performance?
text:
Struggling with the negative effects of your menstrual cycle on your training, performance and recovery? You may find that certain hormonal contraceptives could help. A new study published in the Journal of Sports Sciences suggests that using a hormonal intrauterine device (IUD) or implant may be more likely to support success in endurance sports, while progestin-only oral contraceptives (POC) and no birth control (non-HC) at all might leave you feeling tired and less ready to train.
The study investigated 58 female endurance athletes around age 21 using various methods of contraception: IUD, implant, POC, COC and non-HC. Over 12 months, the participants completed three questionnaires and logged their perceived cycle-related symptom severity , sleep quality, and physical and mental readiness to train, using a scale from one (no symptoms/low sleep quality/not ready) to 10 (severe symptoms/high sleep quality/very ready). Resting heart rate was also reported daily. Data was sorted into pre-bleeding, bleeding and non-bleeding phases of the menstrual cycle.
Results logged by study participants, broken into three phases of the menstrual cycle. Photo: Journal of Sports Sciences Implant users reported significantly less severe symptoms on bleeding days (where symptoms are intensified for all participants), and logged the highest overall sleep quality. IUD users logged the second-highest overall sleep quality and the highest physical readiness to train, but the more severe overall symptoms. IUD and non-HC appeared to support a relatively consistent resting heart rate.
Reports from POC users, on the other hand, indicated lower physical readiness to train and the worst sleep quality across all menstrual cycle phases. Non-HC users logged severe cycle-related symptoms and felt the least ready to train.
Choosing the best method Since the severity of symptoms was inversely correlated with sleep quality and feeling physically ready for training, it’s essential to limit exposure to factors that could worsen symptoms or slow recovery. Contraception methods with minimal effects on heart rate are ideal for sports where training zones and heart rate monitoring play a key role in fitness tracking.
The study highlights the importance of tailoring contraceptive choices to an athlete’s needs, emphasizing that the right method can make a significant difference in training and performance . Results suggest the implant is the best option to manage symptoms or sleep-related concerns, while the IUD can aid with sleep and heartbeat regulation. Consulting with your doctor to explore these options can be a key step toward achieving your running goals.

author: Tanja Banner
title: Zweite Erde? Hoffnungen um potenziellen Erdzwilling Trappist-1 d werden enttäuscht
text:
Zweite Erde? Hoffnungen um potenziellen Erdzwilling Trappist-1 d werden enttäuscht
Die Suche nach einer zweiten Erde konzentrierte sich auf das Trappist-1-System. Nun zeigen neue Daten des „James Webb“-Teleskops ein unerwartetes Ergebnis.
Montréal – Wenn es um Planeten außerhalb unseres Sonnensystems geht, auf denen es möglicherweise Leben geben könnte, dann fällt immer ein Name: „Trappist-1“. Dabei handelt es sich um einen roten Zwergstern, der nur etwa 40 Lichtjahre von der Erde entfernt ist und von sieben Planeten umkreist wird, die etwa erdgroß sind. Mehrere dieser Planeten befinden sich in der sogenannten „habitablen Zone“ des Sterns – das heißt, auf ihnen herrschen Temperaturen, die flüssiges Wasser an der Oberfläche möglich machen.
Deshalb gilt das „Trappist-1“-System als die größte Hoffnung bei Forschenden, eine „zweite Erde“ im Universum zu finden. Seit das „James Webb“-Weltraumteleskop aktiv ist, kann die Forschungsgemeinschaft die „Trappist-1“-Planeten genauer untersuchen und mehr über sie herausfinden. Dabei steht vor allem eine Frage im Vordergrund: Haben die Planeten in der habitablen Zone Atmosphären?
Suche nach einer zweiten Erde: Der Exoplanet Trappist-1 d ist es wohl nicht
„Letztendlich möchten wir wissen, ob es irgendwo anders etwas Ähnliches wie die Umwelt gibt, die wir auf der Erde genießen, und unter welchen Bedingungen dies möglich ist“, sagt Caroline Piaulet-Ghorayeb (University of Chicago und Université de Montréal in einer Nasa-Mitteilung. „Während das ‚James Webb‘-Weltraumteleskop der Nasa uns erstmals die Möglichkeit gibt, diese Frage bei erdähnlichen Planeten zu untersuchen, können wir Trappist-1 d zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt von der Liste potenzieller Erdzwillinge oder -cousins ausschließen.“ Die Forschungsergebnisse wurden im Fachmagazin The Astrophysical Journal veröffentlicht.
Der Planet Trappist-1 d ist aus der Sicht des Sterns der dritte Planet und befindet sich am Rand der habitablen Zone. Er benötigt nur vier Erdtage, um den Stern einmal zu umrunden. Mithilfe des NIRSpec-Instruments des Weltraumteleskops hat das Forschungsteam nach Molekülen Ausschau gehalten, die in der Erdatmosphäre vorkommen – beispielsweise Wasser, Methan oder Kohlendioxid. Gefunden wurden jedoch keine.
„Webb“-Teleskop entdeckt keine Atmosphäre bei Trappist-1 d
Für das Forschungsteam gibt es verschiedene Gründe, warum um Trappist-1 d keine Atmosphäre entdeckt wurde, wie Piaulet-Ghorayeb erklärt: „Er könnte eine extrem dünne Atmosphäre haben, die schwer zu erkennen ist, ähnlich wie auf dem Mars. Alternativ könnte es sehr dichte Wolken in großer Höhe geben, die unsere Erkennung bestimmter atmosphärischer Signaturen blockieren – eher wie auf der Venus. Oder es könnte sich um einen kargen Felsen ohne jegliche Atmosphäre handeln.“
Allerdings befindet sich Trappist-1 d auch in einem Umfeld, das es schwer macht, eine Atmosphäre dauerhaft zu halten: Rote Zwergsterne sind bekannt dafür, dass sie sehr aktiv sind. Sie schleudern häufig Materie und hochenergetische Strahlung ins Weltall, die die Atmosphäre von kleinen Planeten wegreißen kann – vor allem, wenn die Planeten sich nahe an dem Stern befinden, wie es Trappist-1 d tut. Rote Zwergsterne sind jedoch auch die am häufigsten vorkommenden Sterne in unserer Galaxie, weshalb die Forschung hofft, Planeten zu finden, die im Orbit um einen roten Zwerg ihre Atmosphäre halten können.
Haben die anderen Trappist-1-Planeten vielleicht Atmosphären?
„Wir stehen noch ganz am Anfang, wenn es darum geht, mit ‚Webb‘ nach Atmosphären auf erdähnlichen Planeten zu suchen und die Grenze zwischen Planeten, die eine Atmosphäre halten können, und solchen, die dies nicht können, zu definieren“, betont Co-Autor Björn Benneke. Die Beobachtung der äußeren „Trappist-1“-Planeten mit dem „Webb“-Teleskop läuft derzeit. Wie das Ergebnis aussehen könnte, ist noch unklar. Auf der einen Seite sind die Planeten e, f, g und h weiter vom Stern entfernt – es könnte ihnen also etwas leichter fallen, ihre potenziellen Atmosphären zu halten.
Durch ihre größere Entfernung vom Stern sind sie jedoch auch etwas kühler, was es dem Weltraumteleskop schwerer macht, atmosphärische Signaturen aufzuspüren. „Die Hoffnung für die Atmosphären der Trappist-1-Planeten ist noch nicht verloren“, muntert Piaulet-Ghorayeb auf. „Auch wenn wir auf Planet d keine deutlichen atmosphärischen Signaturen gefunden haben, besteht dennoch die Möglichkeit, dass die äußeren Planeten viel Wasser und andere atmosphärische Komponenten enthalten.“ (tab)

author: Xavier Mitchell
title: Atletico Madrid Secures Copa del Rey Quarter Final Spot with 4-2 Win Over Real Madrid
text:
Atletico Madrid 4-2 Real Madrid – Atleti claim extra time win to book Copa del Rey quarter final spot
Atletico Madrid 4-2 Real Madrid – Atleti claim extra time win to book Copa del Rey quarter final spot
In a thrilling Copa del Rey match, Atletico Madrid secured a 4-2 victory over rivals Real Madrid in extra time. The win saw Atleti advance to the quarter-finals, ending Real Madrid’s 21-match unbeaten streak. The match was characterized by impressive goalkeeping from Jan Oblak and defensive mix-ups that led to crucial goals. Additionally, Diego Simeone’s emotional reaction to the victory highlighted the significance of the win for Atletico Madrid.
Impressive Goalkeeping and Defensive Mix-ups
Throughout the match, Jan Oblak’s exceptional goalkeeping skills played a crucial role in Atletico Madrid’s victory. His quick reactions and saves denied Real Madrid crucial scoring opportunities. Additionally, defensive mix-ups, particularly between goalkeeper Andriy Lunin and defender Antonio Rudiger, led to goals for Atletico Madrid, ultimately shaping the outcome of the match.
We recommended to read: Los Angeles Innocence Project Investigates Scott Peterson’s Claim of Actual Innocence
Emotional Reaction from Diego Simeone
Diego Simeone, known for his passionate demeanor, was visibly overcome with emotion following Atletico Madrid’s victory. His genuine display of emotion on the pitch underscored the significance of the win for the team and the club as a whole.

organizations.name: win over real madrid atletico madrid

author: Jaime Tugayev
title: FBC: Firebreak Delivers A Unique Co-Op Shooter From The Remedy Team
text:
FBC: Firebreak Delivers A Unique Co-Op Shooter From The Remedy Team Remedy By Jaime Tugayev Published 8 hours ago Thread Your changes have been saved
Email is sent
Email has already been sent
close Please verify your email address.
Send confirmation email close You’ve reached your account maximum for followed topics.
Manage Your List Follow Followed Follow with Notifications Follow Unfollow Share Facebook X LinkedIn Reddit Flipboard Copy link Email Link copied to clipboard Sign in to your DualShockers account
If you loved the dark, brutalist atmosphere of Control and the mysterious air of Alan Wake but craved a more run-and-gun experience, you will love FBC: Firebreak .
FBC: Firebreak is a three-player co-op shooter that brings DOOM -esque combat to a grim goofiness reminiscent of Lethal Company .
The game was announced as part of the Xbox October Partner Preview , and places you and your friends as agents of the Federal Bureau of Control.
Your job is delightfully simple: if something is in the wrong dimension , you blow it to smithereens.
The items coming to FBC: Firebreak are varied, including normal items such as a hand-cranked Gatling gun, or a garden gnome that turns living beings from biology into chemistry as it explodes .
Related 10 Best Xbox FPS Games, Ranked From Return to Castle Wolfenstein to the legendary Halo: Combat Evolved, these are some of the very best FPS releases to launch on the original Xbox.
Remedy communications lead Thomas Puha has noted that the tools you get in FBC: Firebreak are not your classic consequence-free power-ups.
You carry the box, you point it at something, you open the box, and you just kind of hope the jaguar doesn't turn around and eat you or your friends instead.
-Thomas Puha, Remedy Comms Officer
Guilt-Free Gunnery Madness
The idea behind FBC: Firebreak is to make a game that is fun and accessible to play with friends but with a guilt-free progression system to keep players engaged.
Puha emphasized that there will be no need for "logging in every day for some loot or fear of missing out" so it seems that FBC: Firebreak wants to avoid the usual FOMO baiting that is unfortunately endemic to modern live service games .
Related Remedy Reports Rising Revenues As Alan Wake 2 Recoups Majority of Development Costs Games developer Remedy announces rising revenues for the first half of 2024, and Alan Wake 2 almost breaks even.
Despite its goofy-doomercore fusion appearance, FBC: Firebreak has a plot, and it is set between the events of Control and Control 2 .
Most of the game is set in the Federal Bureau of Control's Oldest House, a shape-shifting brutalist masterpiece that could easily fit in the heart of East Berlin.
At the same time, director Mike Kayatta makes it clear that FBC: Firebreak is neither a DLC nor a sequel to Control despite taking place in the same universe.
I guess you could say that it's a spin-off, but in the most positive sense of the word. [...] FBC: Firebreak is its own, fully formed thing.
-Mike Kayatta, FBC: Firebreak Game Director
FBC: Firebreak will launch in 2025 for Xbox Series X and S, and PC, available on Xbox Game Pass from day one.
Next 10 Best Co-op Indie Games Teamwork makes the dream work.

author: Léa Guyot
title: Pourquoi c'est important. TikTok sur le point d'être banni des États-Unis ?
text:
Pourquoi c'est important TikTok sur le point d’être banni des États-Unis ?
Jour de vérité pour TikTok aux États-Unis. La Cour suprême doit examiner ce vendredi la constitutionnalité d’une [loi prévoyant son interdiction le 19 janvier prochain](%20/faits-divers-justice/2024/12/18/la-cour-supreme-va-statuer-sur-une-loi-menacant-d-interdire-tiktok). S’il veut continuer d’opérer chez l’oncle Sam, le réseau social détenu par le [géant chinois ByteDance]( /economie/2024/03/14/tiktok-interdit-six-questions-sur-bytedance-la-maison-mere-du-reseau-social) n’a plus vraiment le choix : soit la plus haute juridiction du pays lui donne gain de cause, soit sa maison mère devra vendre ses activités américaines. Et ce, en vertu du “Pafaca”, une loi votée en avril dernier par le Congrès.
Le texte, soutenu aussi bien par des démocrates que des républicains, répond à des préoccupations de sécurité nationale, sur fond de guerre commerciale avec la Chine. L’administration Biden n’a jamais fourni de preuves d’une ingérence de Pékin à travers l’application de vidéos courtes. Ce qui n’empêche pas de nombreux élus de redouter une manipulation de son algorithme à des fins de propagande et un transfert des données personnelles des utilisateurs aux autorités chinoises. TikTok nie en bloc ces accusations et ByteDance refuse de céder sa poule aux œufs d’or, au motif que cela serait impossible « technologiquement, commercialement ou légalement ». Mais jusqu’ici, ils ont été déboutés de tous leurs recours en justice. Leur dernier espoir repose sur les juges – en majorité conservateurs – de la Cour suprême.
Trump retourne sa veste
Ce vendredi, ils entendront les arguments de la plateforme, selon laquelle la loi “Pafaca” bafoue le premier amendement, garantissant la liberté d’expression. Les dirigeants de TikTok ne sont d’ailleurs pas les seuls à penser que « le Congrès des États-Unis a adopté une restriction massive et sans précédent de la liberté de parole » : plusieurs associations, dont Amnesty International et la puissante Union américaine pour les libertés civiles, estiment qu’une interdiction du réseau social serait disproportionnée.
Fait rare, [Donald Trump](/p/donald-trump) partage cet avis. Après avoir voulu bannir TikTok pendant son premier mandat, le milliardaire a opéré un virage à 360 degrés au cours de la [dernière élection présidentielle](/elections/elections-americaines). Bien conscient que le réseau social lui a permis de se faire entendre des jeunes, il a avoué avoir un « faible » pour TikTok et vouloir le « sauver ». Il a même récemment rencontré son PDG, Shou Zi Chew, dans sa résidence privée en Floride.
Le problème, c’est que la date butoir pour TikTok survient la veille de son arrivée à la Maison Blanche. Fin décembre, ses avocats ont donc [demandé à la Cour suprême de suspendre l’entrée en vigueur de la loi](/politique/2024/12/28/donald-trump-s-adresse-a-la-cour-supreme-pour-secourir-tik-tok), le temps que le républicain résolve la situation « par des moyens politiques ». La juridiction accédera-t-elle à sa demande ? Jugera-t-elle la loi contraire ou conforme à la Constitution américaine ? Si cette dernière hypothèse se vérifie, ByteDance acceptera-t-il de se séparer de TikTok ?
Impossible de télécharger ou mettre à jour l’appli
L’homme d’affaires américain Frank McCourt, propriétaire de l’Olympique de Marseille, a déjà manifesté son intérêt. Mais pour Vincent Lefrere, maître de conférences en économie numérique à l’Institut Mines-Télécom, « il n’y aura pas de vente car ce serait un signe de désaveu pour la Chine ». Si la Cour suprême déboute TikTok, Apple et Google pourraient donc être contraints, d’ici une dizaine de jours, de retirer l’application de leur boutique respective.
Dans un tel cas de figure, « TikTok ne disparaîtrait pas des téléphones américains tout de suite », nuance Vincent Lefrere : il ne serait plus possible de télécharger l’application, ni de la mettre à jour, mais rien n’obligerait les Américains à la désinstaller. Reste à savoir « à quel point les utilisateurs resteront fidèles, malgré les coûts d’entrée qui vont être de plus en plus élevés », complète l’enseignant.
Une interdiction constituerait en tout cas « un coup dur » pour TikTok, qui revendique 170 millions d’utilisateurs actifs aux États-Unis, soit la moitié de la population. En 2024, ce marché lui a permis de récolter 12,3 milliards de dollars (11,93 milliards d'euros) en revenus publicitaires. Les créateurs de contenus américains, qui gagnent au total 300 millions de dollars par an avec leurs vidéos, seraient eux aussi perdants. À long terme, un bannissement pourrait aussi provoquer « un manque de confiance des investisseurs étrangers », voire accroître « la guerre commerciale » sino-américaine si Pékin décide de réagir, avance Vincent Lefrere.
D’autres pays ont déjà franchi le pays
Si la Cour suprême valide la loi qui doit entrer en vigueur le 19 janvier prochain, les États-Unis ne seraient pas le premier pays à prohiber TikTok. Le réseau social est banni en Inde depuis 2020 et a rapidement été remplacé par des plateformes alternatives. Plus récemment, c’est l’Albanie qui a décidé d’interdire TikTok pour un an. En Europe, la Commission européenne n’autorise pas ses employés à télécharger l’application sur leur téléphone. En France aussi, les fonctionnaires d’État n’ont pas le droit de l’utiliser. Au printemps 2024, les autorités ont même bloqué pendant deux semaines le réseau social en Nouvelle-Calédonie, alors que des émeutes et blocages secouaient l’archipel.

author: 小浪财讯
title: 创业板成长ETF易方达（159597）跌1.01%，半日成交额84.96万元|创业板_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，创业板成长ETF易方达（159597）跌1.01%，报1.182元，成交额84.96万元。创业板成长ETF易方达（159597）重仓股方面， 宁德时代 截止午盘跌1.13%， 东方财富 跌2.19%， 中际旭创 涨3.03%， 汇川技术 跌0.05%， 新易盛 涨0.13%， 迈瑞医疗 跌1.30%， 阳光电源 跌2.96%， 亿纬锂能 涨0.35%， 爱尔眼科 跌1.16%， 同花顺 跌2.55%。
创业板成长ETF易方达（159597）业绩比较基准为 创业板成长指数 收益率，管理人为易方达基金管理有限公司，基金经理为刘文魁，成立（2024-05-08）以来回报为19.38%，近一个月回报为4.55%。

author: Aliza Chasan
title: Norovirus outbreaks reported on 3 cruise ships this month, sickening hundreds - CBS News
text:
U.S. Norovirus outbreaks reported on 3 cruise ships this month, sickening hundreds By Aliza Chasan
December 19, 2024 / 6:27 PM EST / CBS News
Exclusive look at world's largest cruise ship An exclusive look at the world's largest cruise ship 02:05 Hundreds of cruise passengers and workers fell ill with norovirus on three different ships this month, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said.
The CDC has logged outbreaks in 2024 on 14 cruise voyages, but three ships were hit in December. This is the only month this year when the CDC has reported three confirmed norovirus outbreaks on cruise ships and there's still more than a week to go before the month ends. In all, 301 passengers and crew members fell ill during the December outbreaks, health officials said.
Those on Princess Cruises' Ruby Princess, on a trip around Hawaii's island, and Holland America's Rotterdam and Zuiderdam voyages, both in the Caribbean, mostly dealt with diarrhea and vomiting.
The Ruby Princess, a Grand-class cruise ship operated by Princess Cruises. / Getty Images Two Holland America cruise ships hit by norovirus The most recent outbreak was on Holland America's Rotterdam ship, which set sail on Dec. 8 and is set to end its Caribbean
trip Friday in Fort Lauderdale.
Officials said 83 of the 2,192 passengers on board and 12 of the 953 crew members were sickened.
"At Holland America Line, the safety and well-being of our guests and crew is our top priority. During the current voyage, a number of guests on Rotterdam reported symptoms of gastrointestinal illness," a Holland America spokesperson said. "The cases have mostly been mild and quickly resolving."
The Rotterdam cruise ship arrives at Port Everglades on April 02, 2020 in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. / Getty Images In response to the outbreak, there was additional cleaning and disinfection. Sick passengers and crew members were isolated. Stool specimens were collected for testing. The cruise line also consulted with the CDC's Vessel Sanitation Program.
Once the Rotterdam ship arrives in Fort Lauderdale on Friday, it will undergo a comprehensive sanitization process before its next trip, according to the cruise line.
There was also a norovirus outbreak on Holland America's Zuiderdam voyage earlier this month. Over the course of the Dec. 4-Dec. 11 voyage, 87 out of 1,923 passengers were reported ill, in addition to four of the 757 crew members, according to health officials.
A Holland America spokesperson declined to comment on the Zuiderdam outbreak because the voyage had already ended.
Norovirus, the "cruise ship virus" Princess Cruises also dealt with a norovirus outbreak this month on its Ruby Princess ship during a cruise that started on Dec. 2 and ended on Wednesday. The ship started its journey in San Francisco and toured around Hawaii, according to CruiseMapper .
 In all, 103 of 3,001 passengers and 12 of 1,142 crew members onboard reported being ill.
The Ruby Princess was also subject to increased cleaning and disinfection procedures, according to the CDC. Stool specimens were collected for testing and sick passengers and crew members were isolated. The cruise line consulted with the CDC's Vessel Sanitation Program.
CBS News has reached out to Princess Cruises for comment.
There are about 2,500 reported norovirus outbreaks in the U.S. each year. Norovirus, which is sometimes called the "cruise ship virus," causes more than 90% of diarrheal disease outbreaks on cruise ships, according to the CDC . However, norovirus outbreaks on cruise ships account for only a small percentage of all reported norovirus outbreaks.
"Norovirus can be especially challenging to control on cruise ships because of the close living quarters, shared dining areas, and rapid turnover of passengers," according to the CDC. "When the ship docks, norovirus can be brought on board in contaminated food or water; or by passengers who were infected while ashore."
This year, the CDC has logged outbreaks on 14 cruise voyages . Norovirus was listed as the causative agent for most of the outbreaks, though one was caused by salmonella and one was caused by E. coli. The causative agent of one outbreak remains unknown.
Norovirus outbreaks are usually more common during cooler months, typically happening from November to April in countries above the equator, according to the CDC.
More from CBS News Coal use hitting record in 2024, which is likely hottest year yet, report says Virginia hunter dies after bear shot in a tree falls on him Congressional leaders unveil bill to avoid government shutdown 2 soldiers killed by landmine day after troops killed by booby trap In: Cruise Cruise Ship Norovirus Aliza Chasan Aliza Chasan is a Digital Content Producer for "60 Minutes" and CBSNews.com. She has previously written for outlets including PIX11 News, The New York Daily News, Inside Edition and DNAinfo. Aliza covers trending news, often focusing on crime and politics.

author: A Whimsical Lake
title: The aftermath of the food price hike, which has continued since the beginning of the year, is expect.. - MK
text:
The aftermath of the food price hike, which has continued since the beginning of the year, is expected to continue after the Lunar New Year holiday. Companies that are under pressure to raise costs due to prolonged high prices and high exchange rates following the aftermath of the impeachment are forced to make price hikes.
According to the Korea Consumer Organization Council's Price Monitoring Center on the 31st, prices of 39 daily necessities sold by 420 retailers in Seoul and Gyeonggi Province in the fourth quarter of last year rose 1.1% year-on-year on average.
Prices of a total of 19 items rose 4.1% on average, including seasoned laver (23.6%), red pepper paste (9.9%), soy sauce (7.9%), sesame oil (7.2%), and ketchup (6.4%).
Earlier, there were price hikes for products sold at large supermarkets or supermarkets.
Ottogi will raise the price of seven types of cup rice by 12.5% from the 1st of next month and raise the price of its old beef bone soup (500g) by 20%. As a result, the price of seven convenience stores, including cup rice, kimchi tuna rice, Ottogi curry, beef brisket soy bean paste barley rice, sesame oil kimchi fried rice, tuna mayo rice, chicken mayo rice, and talk kimchi rice, will increase by 600 won from 4,800 won to 5,400 won. The price of Ottogi beef bone soup in the old days is 3,000 won, up 500 won from 2,500 won.
Dong-A Otsuka raised the price of drinks such as Pocari Sweat by an average of 6.3%, and Daesang has raised the price of sauce products such as clean mayonnaise and dressing and pepper by an average of 19.1% since the 16th.
The price of eating out has also risen one after another.
According to a survey by the Korea Consumer Agency, prices of seven restaurant menus in Seoul rose an average of 40.2 percent from December 2014 a decade ago.
In particular, the price of jajangmyeon rose 65.0% from 4,500 won to 7,423 won during this period, the largest increase.
Cold noodles prices also jumped 50% from 8,000 won to 12,000 won, and kimchi stew and kalguksu also showed a high price increase of 44.4%. Bibimbap rose 423. percent and pork belly rose 39.5 percent, respectively.
Franchisees are also raising prices this year.
Burger King decided to raise the prices of some products by 100 won just before the Lunar New Year holiday. As a result, the Whopper, the representative menu, will increase from 7,100 won to 7,200 won, and the Garlic Bulgogi Whopper will increase from 7,400 won to 7,500 won. Whopper Jr. costs 4,700 won to 4,800 won.
Starbucks will raise the price of 22 tall-sized drinks by 200 won to 300 won, while Grande and Venti sizes will increase by 100 won. Paul Basset, run by M's Seed, an affiliate of Maeil Dairy, also raised its prices by 200 won to 400 won from the 23rd, while Hallis and Coffee Bean also raised some prices.
It is predicted that this trend of increasing food prices will continue after the Lunar New Year holiday.
An industry official said, "The price of raw materials is also on the rise as internal and external instability continues as the impeachment phase has not been organized," adding, "If this situation is maintained, the industry will have no choice but to raise prices."
